page_text: Milo and Luna swooped down to the meadow where Pip was playing his matchstick harmonica. 'Hello, Pip!' Milo called. Pip smiled wide, 'Hi, friends! Are we going on an adventure?' Luna nodded, 'Yes, Pip. We're off to find the Word Gobbler!' Pip jumped up, eager to join.
text_placement_suggestion: bottom half of the page, below the illustration of the meadow
